html:
11.10.17  9:11 pm   Why do you feel the need to prove yourself to the world

     why did you feel the need to ask me a question, instead of asking someone else

11.10.17  9:01 pm   Do you have a manager or someone you have to answer to for your public image?

     yes but it's me

11.10.17  8:15 pm   If you don't have kids, what'll your children think of you?

     probably nothing

11.10.17  8:02 pm   I really like the instrumentals in "fish opinions", is there a full (by full i mean longer/extended) version of it?

     it was made exclusively for the video. the longest it goes is maybe 1 second longer at most

11.10.17  7:55 pm   what's your thought process on your song "i'm crazy / it's raining"? i can't seem to stay away from the song, it's too catchy!

     it's just kind of sad and reflective. but when recording it i tried to make it as interesting as possible, because i was already a bit concerned that it was too sad

11.10.17  7:53 pm   Knock knock 

     come in

11.10.17  7:47 pm   do you ever get asked how you do things but you don't know how you do it? 

     yes

11.10.17  7:21 pm   are you "notbillwurtz" on instagram?

     yes

11.10.17  7:03 pm   Was the letter you were writing on your floor the same letter that you wrote to yourself that said you were a stupid idiot?

     no. they were also both fictional

11.10.17  6:20 pm   CAN I TYPE IN ALL CAPS WITHOUT SEEMING LIKE I'M ANGRILY YELLING?

     maybe if you talk about gentle, and sensitive topics

11.10.17  6:12 pm   Hi I thought I'd ask you another question. Your website is riddled with spelling mistakes I think you should fix these thanks.

     most of them are on the questions page, in purple, which is the questions submitted by other people. i would fix them but i have a rule not to change people's questions

11.10.17  5:43 pm   Why don't you write atonal music? 

     maybe i do, but every time anyone does anything they think is atonal, there is always some kind of 'atonal expert' who comes along and says 'no, that's not really atonal'

11.10.17  5:27 pm   How to release all the rage?

     open the cage

11.10.17  5:27 pm   can you answer this question with a four word response?

     i'll see what i can do

11.10.17  5:14 pm   QUICK! Tell me a fact about bees.

     there is a huge one, in the car

11.10.17  5:08 pm   do you usually put new videos on your website or youtube first

     i try to do it both at the same time

11.10.17  4:37 pm   yo is /u/officialbillwurtz on reddit you

     no

11.10.17  2:35 pm   do you have a questions page

     i will check

11.10.17  2:32 pm   whats your status

     ok

11.10.17  2:11 pm   are your videos directed at a significant other? 

     no

11.10.17  1:36 pm   Bass playin' tip of the day?

     join as many bands as you can

11.10.17  12:36 pm   why is "k" part of the alphabet when "c" is already doing, a good job?

     for the same reason you are allowed to ask a question, even though everyone else is already doing a great job

11.10.17  11:09 am   why dont you have a navigation bar at the top of your website...........what the heck

     why don't you have a navigation bar in your question

11.10.17  11:09 am   is "sjoiffeisfjisefaeimcmweaaddkaeimaiffkddskcwicmakswiejdiajksjdkckldklsmckdsmckdvkdnkvnieojaskdnkdnmclkdnvascneiwklascmnekcnaekO" a poem?

     it can be, with the right attitude

11.10.17  9:43 am   Do you know how to say goodbye?

     not really

     And do you implement it?

11.10.17  9:41 am   Do you own a printer?

     yes

11.10.17  8:40 am   why dont you change your patreon so it says "bill wurtz is creating things and stuff" or something i'm sure you can figure something out. plus you could even pull the graphics free title graphics trick again

     because i hate the way that sounds. mainly i hate the way "is creating" sounds, but scientists have not figured out how to remove that yet

11.10.17  7:52 am   are you "officialbillwurtz" on reddit?

     no

11.10.17  7:42 am   So I just went into a bathroom that had an automatic soap dispenser and an automatic tap on the sink... neither worked for me. Sink didn't turn on. Soap didn't dispense. Then another guy came in and they worked just fine for him! I tried again, and it still didn't work for me. Please explain. Am I a god damn ghost or something?

     no, they usually do that to me

11.10.17  7:38 am   11.9.17  3:05 pm I really don't care for your usual use of punctuation, but jesus please don't use commas like that ever again. It's painful to read

     it's only painful for those who have some how been conditioned to see it that way. speaking of jesus, please find another page to read, especially if you are in pain

11.10.17  7:16 am   i'm looking for the questions page, am i in the right place?

     yes

11.10.17  5:27 am   are you /u/officialbillwurtz on the subreddit?

     no

11.10.17  4:32 am   what's the theme of the day?

     earth

11.10.17  3:10 am   11.8.17  5:45 pm which ted though

     i don't know, the one from ted talks??

11.10.17  2:42 am   is /u/officialbillwurtz on reddit you

     no

11.10.17  2:42 am   how many things does it take to make a thing?

     try 1

11.10.17  1:46 am   Is /u/officialbillwurtz on Reddit you? (I'm kinda guessing not, but "Word of God" and all that.)

     no

11.10.17  1:31 am   11.9.17  2:52 pm then how do you find friends?

     i don't know

11.10.17  12:27 am   i grew up listening to a lot of pop country because that's what my parents listened to in the car. and so naturally i had a long phase of thinking i was too cool and urban or whatever to listen to it. but then recently, partly thanks to you, i'm like ! oh cool i can listen to what i like and im going back and finding there's some great stuff. Nice!

     oh true

11.9.17  11:54 pm   what do you see god as? something artificial that's only made to worship? or the almighty?

     i see the word 'god' as like the parody meme of something much more important

11.9.17  11:53 pm   why was there a fidget spinner in soap tips

     because it was a less frightening option than king leopold ii of belgium

11.9.17  11:49 pm   do you sing

     yes

11.9.17  11:46 pm   have you ever felt so regretful, it was crushing, but then you thought




i can make a hella good song from this

     yes

11.9.17  11:36 pm   do you have a diary?

     i call it a journal, and it's all audio now

11.9.17  9:36 pm   What drives your creative process?

     mainly time and space

11.9.17  9:01 pm   Hey Bill, what's your favorite thing?

     why can't i experience different things, in an ensemble

11.9.17  8:47 pm   Could you describe yourself in 2 letters? 

     ok

11.9.17  8:17 pm   How to play the 'bow chicka wow wow' riff that people sometimes sing when talking about the sexy times?

     i think if you get a wa wa pedal you will figure it out very quickly

11.9.17  7:16 pm   Do you consider yourself a song farmer?

     i never thought of it like that but yes
